name: My WP Customize Admin/Frontend
author: gqevu6bsiz

sections.description:
Simply and easy-to-use the customize for Admin and Frontend. A lot of custom filters and actions, and included the developer tools.

The demo site is here: https://tastewp.com/new/?pre-installed-plugin-slug=my-wp

Easy setting screen

Easily customize based on check boxes and text boxes.

Many customization

Freely editable admin sidebar, Admin footer text, Dashboard, Disable Author archive, etc … and more customize. My WP Customize

Custom actions and filters

There are lots of custom actions and filters.

Developer tools

You will speed up to your site creation. Debug on current post, Debug on current using theme, Debug on server info, …etc more helpful info.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire mywp folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. You will find ‘My WP’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.
sections.changelog:
1.23.0 2023-12-25

  • Added: Debug for rest API.
  • Added: Hide setting for WordPress CORE sitemap.
  • Added: Send X-Frame-Options header on frontend.
  • Fixed: Some small fix.

1.22.2 2023-11-27

  • Fixed: Autovivification fixed for PHP 8.1.

  • Updated: Compatibility for PHP 8.1 and WP 6.4.
  • Fixed: Hide search box on uploads.
  • Fixed: Print template file name when empty template.
  • Fixed: Change label on post edit.
  • Fixed: Print translation content when empty translation object.

sections.reviews:
Great Plugin - 6 von 5 stars

By zapfeis on May 24, 2023

Thanks, great plugin. Helps a lot. Addon for user roles also.
Super Plugin. Macht hervorragend was es soll, insbesondere mit dem ebenfalls kostenlosen Addon für user roles.

Perfect

By Guy Iaccarino (guyiac) on March 29, 2023

Great plug in. Light weight, simple, easy to use, does a lot but doesn't try to do too much. It knows what it's for and it does it's job extremely well. After trying a bunch of these, I settled on this, and so far, so good.

Very good, but...

By albertcorbett on October 11, 2023

As for the use of the plugin, I already loved … It's simple but also very complete !! But unfortunately for me the possibility to export and import the settings, thus making it easier to migrate to other sites or backup.

Thanks!

By mirawebtr on September 13, 2022

thanks. life saver plugin.

Impressive customizer for WP front/backend

By robinfritig on November 23, 2021

For now I can tell this plugin is working great with an amazing UX consideration. I will implement it for my clients to build nice dashboard environnements ! As the plugin is still maintained in this end of 2021, I recommend it. Thanks for that !

Does not cover expectations

By mairimweb on March 1, 2021

The plugin is not very intuitive, in addition to not being complete as in its previous version, now it is not possible to know in which user role it is being customized, in addition to having to install a plugin, we must continue reloading our website with more plugins Since this by itself does not end up working, the little UX that it had in this version no longer has it, I hope you can solve it.

User Role Logic

By ddmmdit on August 13, 2020

Amazing plugin, but can you add user role logic, which Hide/show can be selected base on user role... thanks

Perfect WordPress Admin Customizing Plugin

By technologypoet on February 29, 2020

This plugin is near perfect for customizing your WordPress Admin Dashboard. The UI is a *huge* upgrade over the previous version. While there is a small charge if you want to customize differently per WordPress role, it's well worth it for the ease of use and stability provided by this plugin. The few times I've needed to reach out for support have been fantastic, the author is very responsive and has always helped resolve my issue. I use this plugin on multiple sites, and highly recommend it!

Simple and helpful

By yourtrustedfreelancer on January 25, 2020

Great plugin, and it works as needed, many thanks

Don't use it at all, it's buggy

By waelwrw on March 17, 2019

Not easy to use, can not undo hiding an item from the sidebar for specific role, and adding item is buggy.
